name: 林榮禾
objective:
在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行 "系統化創新" 是企業不可或缺的競爭策略及唯一的生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地應用。本課程以 TRIZ 創新方法為基礎，詳細的介紹系統性創新理論及實務的解題手法及落實創新方法之實務應用，可以很有系統地帶領學生們拓展革新思維，有效及系統化之應用於各種產業。讓學生也有機會應用於生活問題的解決。
Nowadays, enterprises are in the phase of violating competence and decreasing profit. To make it survive, enterprises need to implement a systematic innovation technique, but only a few companies really understand and implement it. The aim of this course is based on the applications of the TRIZ creative method in detail which includes the theory of systematic innovation and application, and also leading students to learn how the TRIZ works, and practice to solve their real-life and various industries problems.
